DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if a single session of aerobic exercise effectively controls the blood pressure (BP) of individuals with type 2 diabetes mellitus (T2DM) over the 24h of post-exercise period, and the effects of intensity of aerobic exercise on these BP responses.
DOC.criteria: sedentary a diagnosis of T2DM for at least one year glycemic control through nutrition and/or medication be not under use of exogenous insulin and do not present chronic complications such as diabetic foot nephropathy retinopathy neuropathies and cardiovascular diseases
